content.text: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded" )

content.text: 1 onion, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 onion, chopped" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons minced garlic
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 tablespoons minced garlic" )

content.text: 2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon dried basil
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 tablespoon dried basil" )

content.text: 1 cube vegetable bouillon
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 cube vegetable bouillon" )

content.text: black pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "black pepper to taste" )

content.text: 1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped" )

content.text: 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese" )

content.text: 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "325 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "165 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray.
2) Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "squash halves"@9:22 / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "cut side down"@23:36 / OTHER )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "the baking sheet"@40:56 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "squash"@8:14 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "35 minutes"@15:25 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "the preheated oven"@29:47 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until a knife can be easily inserted"@52:88 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Remove from oven, and cool.
5) Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray.
6) Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "saute"@21:26 / AC
		:heat ( "medium heat"@8:19 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the onion"@27:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "garlic"@41:47 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until golden brown"@48:66 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "tomatoes"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "basil"@21:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "bouillon cube"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "black pepper"@47:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "15 minutes"@18:28 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until you have a medium thick sauce"@33:68 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells.
10) Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Layer"@4:9 / AC
		:gol ( "each half"@10:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "a spoonful of the sauce"@25:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "spaghetti squash strands"@61:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "olives"@87:93 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "mozzarella cheese"@99:116 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( "a layer"@50:57 / OTHER )
)

content.text: 11) Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Repeat"@4:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "layers"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-11-0 "until shells are full"@18:39 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( cond-11-1 "until all of the ingredients are used"@44:81 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Top with Parmesan cheese.
13) Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-13-0 "20 minutes"@13:23 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-13-0 "the preheated oven"@27:45 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:until ( cond-13-1 "until Parmesan cheese melts"@50:77 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
